doc:
Erik Bauersfeld https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erik_Bauersfeld 0 Erik Bauersfeld (June 28, 1922 – April 3, 2016) was an American radio dramatist and voice actor. His most notable role was providing the voices of Admiral Ackbar and Bib Fortuna in the third film of the original Star Wars trilogy, Return of the Jedi (1983). He reprised his role as the voice of Admiral Ackbar in Star Wars: The Force Awakens (2015). Erik_Bauersfeld ( June_28_,_1922 – April_3_,_2016 ) was an_American_radio_dramatist_and_voice_actor . His_most_notable_role was_providing the_voices of Admiral_Ackbar and Bib_Fortuna in the_third_film of the_original_Star_Wars_trilogy , Return of the_Jedi_(_1983_) . He reprised his_role as the_voice of Admiral_Ackbar in Star_Wars : The_Force_Awakens ( 2015_) .
